---
title: "13-UK-Prime-Ministers"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(rvest)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_prime_ministers_of_the_United_Kingdom"

html <- read_html(url)

tables <- html %>% 
  html_nodes(".wikitable") %>% 
  html_table()

table <- tables[[2]] 

table %>% as_tibble()
```

```{r}
html %>% 
  html_nodes(".anchor") %>% 
  html_element("title")
```
